davinci.interaction

Interface IAction

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.util.EventListener
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ActionAdapter

    public interface IAction
extends java.util.EventListener
    The general interface of interactions. All the user interactions should
    implement this interface.
    Author:
    Nan Cao
    See Also:
    ActionAdapter
